headline: Nucor Announces Increase in Cash Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Nucor Corporation (NYSE: NUE) today announced the increase of its regular quarterly cash dividend on Nucor's common stock to $0.55 per share. This cash dividend is payable on February 11, 2025 to stockholders of record on December 31, 2024 and is Nucor's 207th consecutive quarterly cash dividend. Nucor has increased its regular, or base, dividend for 52 consecutive years – every year since it first began paying dividends in 1973.
